summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to someone named Heti, attaching a document titled 'Direct Examination v4.docx' and apologizing for not sending it earlier when requested. The email suggests legal preparation or coordination related to a case.

keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York sent an email on November 29, 2021, regarding a legal document titled 'Direct Examination v4.docx'.
The email was addressed to someone named Heti, who had previously requested to see the document.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal preparation or coordination, possibly related to a trial or testimony in a case.
